title: Client Services Coordinator, Club Sites - Pro Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Client Services Coordinator, Club Sites Pro Sports Posted/Updated: 10-20-2015 Brief Job Description: You will assist the Strategy, Account Management and Advertising Operations teams with all aspects of client service, including but not limited to content/advertising audits, Quality...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
